va:valueAssertion.test: $V1 = sum($V2/xs:decimal(data()))

gen:link.msg:message: Total related party = sum of (Parent + Entities with joint control or significant influence + Subsidiaries + Associates + Joint ventures where entity is venturer + Key management personnel + Other related party)

Jumlah pihak berkaitan = jumlah (Induk +Entiti dengan kawalan bersama atau pengaruh signifikan + Anak Syarikat + Syarikat Bersekutu + Usaha sama di mana entiti adalah pengusaha + Personel pengurusan utama + Lain-lain pihak berkaitan)

va:valueAssertion.test: $V1 = sum($V2/xs:decimal(data()))

gen:link.msg:message: When user selects Group THEN Total fund/equity and reserves = sum of (Non controlling interest + Total fund and reserves attributable to owners)
Apabila pengguna memilih Kumpulan KEMUDIAN Jumlah dana/ekuiti dan rizab = Jumlah (Kepentingan tak mengawal + Jumlah dana dan rizab boleh diagihkan kepada pemilik induk)

va:valueAssertion.test: $V1 = sum($V2/xs:decimal(data()))

gen:link.msg:message: Total fund and reserves attributable to owners = sum of (Accumulated funds (deficit) + Members funds + Reserves)
Jumlah dana dan rizab boleh diagihkan kepada pemilik induk = Jumlah (Dana (Defisit) terkumpul + Dana ahli + Rizab)

va:valueAssertion.test: $V1 = sum($V2/xs:decimal(data()))

gen:link.msg:message: Reserves = sum of (Sub-total of non-distributable reserves + Other distributable reserves)
Rizab = jumlah (Jumlah kecil rizab tidak boleh diagihkan + Jumlah kecil rizab boleh diagihkan)
